channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Happy 250th Birthday to the Few, the Proud, the Marines
item.description: America’s unique land, air, and sea force has a glorious history, and artists have taken note.

item.title: The 50-Year Mortgage Would Make Things Worse for Gen Z
item.description: This is not the answer to the housing crisis.

item.title: This Time, It’s the Populists Who Are Underestimating Trump
item.description: The idea that another candidate can win in 2028 with a purer version of Buchananism ignores the president’s actual appeal.

item.title: The Government vs. Animal Lovers
item.description: If you enjoy the company of animals, the government may deem you a criminal.

item.title: Fighting to Preserve the American Experiment
item.description: The conservative movement is needed today more than ever, especially as the alternatives fail.

item.title: Trump signs final bill to reopen government after record shutdown
item.description: President Trump signed legislation late Wednesday ending the record-long government shutdown, resolving the 43-day closure caused by Democrats' demand...

item.title: Judge signals hundreds of people detained in Chicago immigration crackdown could be released on bond

item.title: Pennsylvania County Launches Investigation Into Election Flop That Left 75K Voters Out Of Poll Books

item.title: California revokes 17,000 commercial driver's licenses but disputes move is over immigration concern

item.title: Trump Must Crush The Left’s Antifa-Led Terror Network Or It Will Crush His Movement
item.description: The American people look to Trump to eradicate this massive domestic threat, but those calls do not seem to be yielding any results.

item.title: Ben Shapiro And Anyone Else Telling Young People To ‘Just Move’ Are Missing The Point
item.description: If we continue to fail to address fundamental economic problems, eventually it won't matter where you move to.

item.title: Importing Foreign Workers To Take Americans’ Jobs Is The Opposite Of America First
item.description: You cannot put America first by putting Americans last.
